post.author: Admin
post.title: NRHS Band Program Newsletter – February 20, 2017
post.description: Feb 27 – Band Booster Meeting 7pm Media Center – Greg Gurka will be attending to answer Bond Issue Q
post.content:
Feb 27 – Band Booster Meeting 7pm Media Center – Greg Gurka will be attending to answer Bond Issue Questions.

LINKS you need to know:

  • Mr. Vitale’s Website
  • Band Booster’s Website
  • FaceBook North Royalton Band Boosters -- Like Us!!

DATES you need to know:

  • February 27– Band Booster Meeting 7pm in Media Center
  • February 28 – High School Contest Concert 7pm PAC

Munching for Music – Five Guys

Thank you to everyone that turned out for our Munching for Music event! We will let you know what the event earned for our Band Program! Watch the newsletter for the next Munching for Music event!

OPEN Chairposition

As mentioned above, we are in need of TWO people to chair our Fruit Sale next year. I can honestly say that I have worked with Susie and Karen this year and these gals have TOTALLY organized this committee and have fantastic notes for you to follow for next year. Consider volunteering NOW since both Karen and Susie are available to go over everything with you for next year! Call Amanda Kost 440-864-6543 or Susie Perez 440-877-1299 if you are interested in volunteering. It is a FUN committee!!

Mark Your Calendar - Basket Raffle

Our annual Basket Raffle event will be MAY 6th and 3Spot in North Royalton. The 3Spot will be giving us the MAIN DINING room for our event this year! So mark your calendar and we will be getting more information out soon.
